Literature.Title: Mersacidin, a new antibiotic from Bacillus. Fermentation, isolation, purification and chemical characterization.
Literature.Author: Chatterjee S, Lad SJ, Phansalkar MS, Rupp RH, Ganguli BN, Fehlhaber HW, Kogler H
